entry.description: 将船舶任务子表数据同步到临时表
entry.value: INSERT INTO tab_temp_b (id, Time, Cmsid, PushTime, OneTask, direction, unloaderMove, operationType, offset, groupId) SELECT id, Time, Cmsid, PushTime, OneTask, direction, unloaderMove, operationType, offset, ? from tab_temp_b_?
